ru.bit.torrent

Class FileAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.bit.torrent.FileAccess

  • public class FileAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to interact with the file we're downloading to/ uploading from - it contains methods to read and write specific pieces from the file.
    Author:
    Jonas Schreiber, Charles Zuppe, Dylan Murray

    • Field Summary

      • writeNulls

        public void writeNulls()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Called upoon creation of a new torrent file. Ensures that RandomAccessFile will not try to access parts of the file that haven't been written. Also utilized in the TallyPieces() method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • tallyPieces

        public boolean[] tallyPieces()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Called upon resuming a torrent download. This is used to determine which pieces have already been downloaded and written to file. A boolean array is created, length , and that in turn can be used to set manager's myPieces field.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

           throws java.io.IOException
